name: Chaos Coots
description:
Play as Coots the Cat and erase the glitchy rogue robots from corrupting Ludwig's house.  Hack and slash through various rooms and reach the source of the corruption and do not get corrupted yourself. Contain various visual "glitches" and difficult gameplay.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Left Click to Attack

- Right Click to Dash

Tips:

- Dashing makes you invincible for a short time

- Attacking projectiles can deflect them

- You can destroy furniture
